column1: in memory of christopher keith cullars -- banister funeral home| christopher keith cullars. july 3
column9: 2015. chris was a native and lifelong resident of lumpkin county. he was a member of fortson memorial baptist church and he was ordained as a minister there. he enjoyed playing basketball
column11: and spending time with time with friends. chris was preceded in death by his mother
column12: vivan keith cullars who passed away on march 17
column13: 2015. he is survived by his father
column16: ga along with a host of other relatives and friends. funeral services for chris are scheduled for 1 pm wednesday june 24
column17: 2015 at the banister funeral home chapel in dahlonega. rev. john paul webb will officiate. interment will follow in dahlonega memorial park cemetery. the family will receive friends at banister funeral home in dahlonega on tuesday
column19: 2014 from 5 pm until 8 pm. online condolences may be made at www. banisterfuneralhome. net. banister funeral home of dahlonega
column20: ga is in charge of the arrangements.
